job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><u>Responsibilities:</u></strong></p><ul><li>Understands that testing and coding go hand in hand</li><li>Solves problems with SOLID reusable components built on well known patterns</li><li>Has the ability to produce clean, DRY code on aggressive timelines</li><li>Can mentor other team members and show them the path to clean, DRY code</li><li>Believes that good code metrics are not just interesting goals but requirements</li><li>Possesses strong Git-fu</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong><u>Requirements</u></strong>: </p><ul><li>Computer Science degree or related</li><li>Has experience with Java, Spring Framework and Javascript</li><li>Has experience with MySQL, Postgres, or equivalent RDBMS</li><li>Experience with Map/Reduce programming and Hadoop is preferred</li><li>Experience working in Amazon Web Services is preferred</li><li>Experience with containerization is preferred</li></ul><p></p>
